title: [Massive] Online Smoking Cessation Treatment Education: Mobile-Based Intensive Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and patient counseling experience
context.additional_context: Education design accessible via smartphones for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain evidence-based smoking cessation treatment approaches.
In mobile environments, learners can complete patient consultation scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to propose three intervention techniques applicable to real-world tasks within 72 hours of completing the educational program.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
